author: Minecraft
description:
Minecraft Monthly is back from summer break! Can you spot all the clues to the name of our next game drop? And will Professor Vu manage to spell “oxidation”? Find out as you get the scoop on this month’s topics:

- Copper, copper, and more copper
- The Smurfs DLC
- Oxidation – how does it work?
- An adorable interaction between copper and iron golems
- The name of our next drop!

Learn more about our upcoming game drop: https://minecraft.net/article/third-game-drop-2025-name-announce

Discover the Smurfs DLC: https://www.minecraft.net/en-us/article/smurfs-dlc
title: NEXT GAME DROP NAME IS... | MINECRAFT MONTHLY
